body.p: The -plugin Remove Temporary Files helps users to remove temporary files from . The tool collects all temporary files and displays it in panel Remove temporary files, where users can either select individual enries or even all entries to delete it.

In order to delete temporary files from , process these steps:
The section Temporary files being deleted contains all files which can be deleted.
Either mark or un-mark a single checkbox on the left-hand side of the entry.
In order to mark all entries in the list, klick on button Select All.
In order to unmark all entries in the list, klick on button Deselect All.
Field Number of selected files: shows the total amount of file a user selected.
Field Total size of selected files: shows the total amount of KB (Kilo Byte) of the files a user selected. As soon as the process has ended, the panel Remove temporary files is closed.
In order to delete the selected files, click on button Delete selected files.
In order to close the panel with no action performed, click on button Cancel.
